version_description: Update Sign In page, makes it more attractive

The CSCPay Mobile app has been updated to make it faster, more reliable and even easier to use. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update.

Redesigned and simplified Home view.

- Check if washers and dryers are available or when the next one is ready to use
- See how much time is left until your laundry is done
- Manage your account, review your balance and add funds easily

We've also made it easier for new users to sign up with email.

Have a question? Tap Help or Give Feedback in the app. You can also reach Customer Care by phone at 877-264-6622 or by email at customerservice@cscserviceworks.com.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is important.

This release includes a fix for an issue that some may have experienced while using the Pull to Refresh feature on the recently updated Home View. If you experience issues, please tap Give Feedback in the app to report them so we can continue to improve your experience.

This update to the CSCPay Mobile app makes it easy to add extra time to your laundry cycle. For supported machines, after starting a cycle, tap the “Add Time” button below the active cycle in the My Laundry section of the Home view. You can Add Time at any point during an active cycle.

We’ve also included bug fixes and other improvements.

Have a question? Tap Give Feedback in the app. You can also reach Customer Care by phone at 877-264-6622 or by email at customerservice@cscserviceworks.com.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is important.

This update includes improvements to how sessions are maintained during app updates, and should be one of the last times you are required to sign in again following an update. With future app releases, you should remain signed in.

We’ve also included bug fixes and other improvements.

Have a question? Tap Give Feedback in the app. You can also reach Customer Care by phone at 877-264-6622 or by email at customerservice@cscserviceworks.com.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is important.

This update introduces a redesign of My Account. Now featuring only settings directly related to the CSCPay Mobile app experience, this usability improvement reduces the potential for confusion surrounding laundry location, payment method, and more. Account settings not directly related to the app are still available online. Read more at https://help.getpaymobile.com.

Have a question? Tap Give Feedback in the app. You can also reach Customer Care by phone at 877-264-6622 or by email at customerservice@cscserviceworks.com.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is important.
This update includes improvements addressing issues which caused some users to see Internet Connection error messages while performing certain activities in the app.
This update includes miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements.
This update includes miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements.

In this update, it's quicker and easier to add funds to your CSCPay Mobile account balance. And, once you've added a credit card, you're just a tap away from simple set up of Auto-Refill which lets you keep your balance topped off and at the level you need, automatically.

Alongside existing options to create and sign in to a CSCPay Mobile account using Email, Google login, and Facebook login, this update introduces support for Sign In with Apple. If you'd like to create an account and sign in to CSCPay Mobile using your Apple ID, tap Continue with Apple on the app sign up screen.
